title: Snail

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to inch closer to your target. After using this ability 5 times you kill them and this can't be stopped for any reason.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with an evil target. You aren't informed who they are, but you are told their role.
- After hanging a town player, you can use your night ability twice in one night.
- After hanging an evil player, gain roleblock immunity permanently.
- **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**

desc:
Post 4673
*1 million dollars but a snail is hunting you and if it touches you it kills you*
